com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Class SecureInputConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecureInputConstant
  • Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in future major release, the replacement class is SecureInputDefaultSettings

    @Deprecated
public final class SecureInputConstant
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the constant values to be used by the Secure Keypad.
    Since:
    4.0
